title: After the Romans crushed the Eburones

content.question: After the Romans crushed the revolt of the Eburones, their leader Ambiorix

choices.label: poisoned himself since he was too old to flee
crossed the Rhine and was never seen again
was paraded in Caesarâ€™s triumphal procession in Rome
was assassinated by his own people since he was favored by Caesar

content.answer: crossed the Rhine and was never seen again

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
